title: Fitness leader weight training encyclopaedia
creator_credit: Australian Council for Health, Physical Education and Recreation
brief_description: Presents a range of weight training exercises for different parts of the body. Indicates exercises that develop muscular strength and endurance, muscular size and definition and aerobic fitness.
